旻字的基本解释

旻
mín
天，天空；又特指秋季的天：旻天。苍旻。

旻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mín］
［《廣韻》武巾切，平真，明。］
［《集韻》眉貧切，平真，明。］
(1)秋天。
(2)天；天空。
(3)通“閔”。痛伤。

旻字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　旻； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页490第25
【廣韻】武巾切【集韻】【韻會】眉貧切，?音珉。【說文】秋天也。【爾雅·釋天】秋爲旻天。【註】旻猶愍也，愍萬物彫落。【疏】秋，萬物成熟，皆有文章，故曰旻天。【釋名】旻，閔也。物就枯落，可閔傷也。【書·大禹謨】日號泣于旻天于父母。【傳】仁覆愍下，故曰旻天。【詩·小雅】旻天疾威。　【集韻】或作閔。通作?。

旻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
旻字的起名意思

：指天，天空；又特指秋季的天。

Min
Basic explanation of words
Min
mín
The sky, the sky; also specifically refers to the autumn sky: Mintian. Cang Min.
Min
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mín］
["Guangyun" Wujin cut, plain and clear. ]
["Jiyun" brows are poor and cut, plain and clear. ]
(1) Autumn.
(2) The sky; the sky.
(3) Connect "Min". Hurts.
Min

[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　 Min; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 490 to 25
[Guangyun] Wujin cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] The eyebrows are poor and cut,? Yin Min. [Said the text] Autumn also. 【Erya·Shitian】Autumn is Mintian. [Note] Min still stunned, stunned everything. 【Sparse】In autumn, everything is mature and there are articles, so it is called Mintian. [Release name] Min, Min Ye. Things will wither, but Min hurts too. 【Book·Dayumo】The day name cried at Mintian at his parents. [Biography] Ren Fu stunned, so it is called Mintian. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Min Tian is very powerful.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo Min. Pass for?.
